GSD.description:
net: ieee802154: at86rf230: Stop leaking skb's

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.181 by commit 455ef08d6e5473526fa6763f75a93f7198206966. For more details please see the references link.
